system.description:
Benefit

The character can fire any personal plasarm, lasarm, or elarm without penalty.

Normal

Characters without this feat take a -4 penalty on attack rolls made with personal plasarms, lasarms and elarms, and can not reload plasarms, lasarms, or elarms.

Tutoring

Time: 1 hour

Benefit: Can reload plasarms, lasarms and elarms and attack penalty is reduced to -3
system.summary: Use and reload energy weapons without penalty
